scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run unit
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && cp deps/* downport && rm downport/zcl_aff_writer_xslt.clas.testclasses.abap && abaplint --fix abaplint-downport.jsonc
